attributes.action: Stop The Outdoor Drinking Bann at Newton Abbot Racecourse
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the goverment to consider overturning the Bann on drinking alcohol outdoor at Newton Abbot
I beleive the is bann prevents is ridiclious because their are already measures to prevent people from harming other with the plastic glass already in use.I would be grateful let common sence prevail.it also soils the a fun day somewhat

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is one for the racecourse owners.
